title: Denis Mannix’s Maillard experiment proposals
post: Dennis now has about nine comments expressing interest, but also scepticism.  Giulio Fanti while critical of Ray Rogers’ Maillard hypothesis, generously offers his advisory services.  Colin Berry gives chemistry reasons for his scepticism, and is supported by Adrie van der Hoeven.  Ray Schneider is supportive of intent of experiment.
